title: Perfect for my Heavy to Light Days!
content: These are Literally my go to for my periods! I love that it comes in 3 different sizes because each one works perfectly for my heavy periods. Super plus for the first 2 days, Super for the next 2 days and regular for the rest of the days I'm on my period. I love the sleek look. They are easy to open and discard. It's like a push pop for your catbox! The tube slides in easily with little to no effort. Minimal to no leakage because I change often.
